content: I would like to :ping_pong: this. Yael already did a great job optimizing my proofs and adding a few lemmas about unions of balanced sets, so I feel that reviewing this should not take too long.
I can't really review this now that I have changed it so much :grinning:
@maintainers could someone put this PR on the queue again or delegate it to me? there was an issue with the has_scalar -> has_smul rename.
